wordBank.name: Abra
wordBank.description: It sleeps eighteen hours a day, but employs telekinesis even while sleeping.

wordBank.name: Butterfree
wordBank.description: Its wings are covered with poisonous dust. If you see one flapping its wings, be careful not to inhale any of the dust.

wordBank.name: Ditto
wordBank.description: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if it is made to laugh, it can't maintain its disguise.

wordBank.name: Eevee
wordBank.description: Possessing an unbalanced and unstable genetic makeup, it conceals many possible evolutions

wordBank.name: Flareon
wordBank.description: It fluffs out its fur collar to cool down its body temperature, which can reach 1,650 degrees.

wordBank.name: Geodude
wordBank.description: At rest, it looks just like a rock. Carelessly stepping on it will make it swing its fists angrily.
